trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter"></xref> for <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter> class provides methods that can convert a string to a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>.
You should never access a type converter directly.
Instead, call the appropriate converter by using <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
For more information, see the examples in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class.

For more information about type converters, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56).
For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter"></xref> class.
Returns whether this converter can convert an object of the specified source type to the native type of the converter using the specified context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type from which you want to convert.
`true` if an object can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Returns whether this converter can convert an object to the given destination type using the context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> that represents the type to which you want to convert.
`true` if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the specified object to the converter's native type.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that provides the language to convert to.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
value does not contain values for all four margins.
For example, "100,100,100,100" specifies 1 inch for the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
The conversion cannot be performed.
Converts the given value object to the specified destination type using the specified context and arguments.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
A <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> that provides the language to convert to.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to which to convert the value.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the converted value.
destinationType is `null`.
The conversion cannot be performed.
Creates an <xref href="System.Object"></xref> given a set of property values for the object.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> of new property values.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the specified <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref>, or `null` if the object cannot be created.
propertyValues is `null`.

Returns whether changing a value on this object requires a call to the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter.CreateInstance(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> method to create a new value, using the specified context.
The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
This can be `null`, so always check.
Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.

`true` if changing a property on this object requires a call to <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter.CreateInstance(System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext,System.Collections.IDictionary)"></xref> to create a new value; otherwise, `false`.
This method always returns `true`.
